children.text: The quad moulding at the eaves lining in this area is falling out, most likely due to insufficient nailing. This will continue to occur, and may also occur in other areas, as the fixing methodology is likely to be consistent throughout this home.
The builder warrants that the work will be carried out in
, which is not the case in this area, and will require the eave quad be properly rectified or replaced and painted prior to handover.
